name: polyester of 1,4-butanediol with caprolactone
SMLTrestrictions: G29 Group Restriction No. 29 corresponds to FCM substance No. 342,672. Group restriction specification is expressed as the sum of 6-hydroxyhexanoic acid and caprolac-tone.
Restrictions: The fraction with molecular weight below 1000 Da shall not exceed 0,5 % (w/w).
ExpressedAs: As the sum of 6-hydroxyhexanoic acid and caprolactone
